btn.titl: I want to receive information about new versions

dlg.name: aktivaceProduktu
dlg.titl: Guide for activation of product ABRA Flexi

msg.name: licenceChybaPodepisovani
msg.titl: Licence signing failed.

msg.name: licenceChybaNacitani
msg.titl: Error has occurred during licence reading.

msg.name: licenceChybaStruktury
msg.titl: Licence has damaged structure.

msg.name: licencePrepsat
msg.titl: Licence already exists in data source. Do you wish to rewrite it?

msg.name: licenceChybaVytvareni
msg.titl: Error has occured during licence creation.

msg.name: licenceNeniPlatnyTyp
msg.titl: File with licence is invalid. Is it really signed?

msg.name: licenceNeniPlatna
msg.titl: Licence is invalid. Please enter valid licence.

msg.name: licenceNotOnPremisesServer
msg.titl: Your license does not allow operation on your own server. To change the license, please contact the sales department.

msg.name: licenseProslaZaruka
msg.titl: The license, you are trying to upload, expired warranty on %p. The application is, however, a newer and therefore the license cannot be upload.

msg.name: licenceImportDotaz
msg.titl: You launched file with ABRA Flexi licence. Do you wish to import it?

msg.name: licenseImportTitleOk
msg.titl: Licence was imported.

msg.name: licenseImportMessageOk
msg.titl: Licence was successfully imported.

msg.name: licenceCheckLimitChybaPriKontrole
msg.titl: It wasn't possible to carry out check of number of records according to licence.

msg.name: licenceCheckLimitVycerpanNelzeNovyZaznam
msg.titl: It is not possible to create new record.\nYour3 licence enables to create only %p records in this module.

msg.name: licenceCheckLimitVycerpanNelzeNovyDoklad
msg.titl: It is not possible to create new document.\nYour licence enables to create only %p documents in this module.

msg.name: licenceCheckValidToPrekrocenNaDokladech
msg.titl: Licence will expire %p.\nIt's not possible to enter documents with date of issue following after this date.

msg.name: licenceCheckUsersLimitVycerpan
msg.titl: It is not possible to add another user.\nYour licence enables to administer only %p users.

msg.name: licenceCheckCompaniesLimitVycerpan
msg.titl: It is not possible to add another company.\nAccording to your licence, maximum number of established companies is: %p.

msg.name: licenceNeumoznujePodvojneUcetnictvi
msg.titl: You are trying to create company with double-entry bookkeeeping but you are not allowed to do so with current licence.

msg.name: licenceChybaPriOverovaniLicence
msg.titl: Non-specific error has occured during licence verifying.

msg.name: licenceCheckApplicationCount
msg.titl: Maximum number of users allowed by licence was exceeded.

msg.name: licenceUzivatelPrihlasenYindeChceteYindeOdhlasit
msg.titl: You are logged on to another device. Do you want to log out?

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogPodekovaniTitle
msg.titl: Registration was successful

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogPodekovaniText
msg.titl: Thank you for registering ABRA Flexi Start!

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogNotMandatory
msg.titl: You must fill in all fields that have caption marked with asterisk (*).

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogUnvalidEmail
msg.titl: Invalid email format. Enter email in format: name@server.domain

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogUnvalidTelephone
msg.titl: Invalid phone format. Enter +420 XXX XXX XXX, where X substitutes your telephone number.

msg.name: registerLicenseDialogRegisterError
msg.titl: Error has occured during registration through application. Please register through web interface.

msg.name: aktivaceProduktuTestNotMandatory
msg.titl: You must fill all fields both selling and activation code.

msg.name: aktivaceProduktuNotMandatory
msg.titl: You must fill all bold fields.

msg.name: aktivaceProduktuJizProbehla
msg.titl: Entered code has already been activated once.

msg.name: aktivaceProduktuChybaServeru
msg.titl: Activation cannot be done at the moment. Please try again later.

msg.name: licenceNepodporujePristupSpecAplikaci
msg.titl: Your license does not support access with specialized application.

msg.name: urlBuy
msg.titl: https://support.flexibee.eu/redirect/buy/

msg.titl: https://support.flexibee.eu/redirect/buy/

msg.name: urlRequestDev
msg.titl: https://www.flexibee.eu/api/licence-pro-vyvojare/zadost-o-vyvojarskou-licenci/

msg.name: importLicenseJenomLicenseMgmt
msg.titl: Import of licenses is permitted only for authorized administrators.

lb.titl: Licence validity starts on the date %p.

lb.titl: To use other languages buy licence from address:

lb.titl: Please ask for licence extension on address:

lb.name: registerLicenseDialogInfo
lb.titl: You are using unregistered application of ABRA Flexi Start at the moment. By registration you acquire the possibility of recording more items and acquiring automatically info about new software versions.

lb.name: startLicenceDialogTextImportovatNeboAktivovat
lb.titl: If you don't have a license, after entering your ID you can:

lb.name: startLicenceDialogTextImportovat
lb.titl: If you already bought the licence, load it in application.

lb.name: startLicenceDialogTextInfo
lb.titl: You have performed the installation of accounting software ABRA Flexi.\nThe next step is importing your licence file:

lb.name: startLicenceDialogContactSales
lb.titl: If you don't have an ID, please contact the sales department of

lb.name: buyLicenceDialogKoupit
lb.titl: You can execute all operations with limited number of records in version Start. If you buy full version, you will remove all restrictions.

lb.name: aktivaceProduktuNadpis
lb.titl: Product activation with help of activation code

lb.name: aktivaceProduktuKontrolaProlog
lb.titl: If you bought product in a store it is necessary to activate it. Then you will be able to use technical support and receive updates.

lb.name: aktivaceProduktuAktivaceProlog
lb.titl: In order to provide you with technical support and application updates we need to fill following data.
